name: Hiro Sushi
address: 3701 Hastings St, Burnaby, BC V5C 2H6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Teriyaki Box

hasMenuItem.description: Barbecued eel, typically served over seasoned sushi rice, makes up this single piece of nigiri sushi.

review.reviewBody: Great variety of sushi and other dishes. The Tempura is expertly done, and the fish tasted fresh.

I ordered Salmon Teriyaki Rice Bowl which I'm surprise cuz I didn't expect that it will be the same as it show in picture.
Worth for the price. And it's tasty actually.
I will definitely order again. Thanks!

Great portion on yakiudon, the seafood one has a good helping of salmon among the other additions.

I'd say really good value for price
Great local sushi place, big sashimi and always fresh. Generous with soysauce as well

hidden gem on Hastings 
nice quality of sashimi and generous portion with a reseasonable price
